name: Captain Dreogan
description:
Alpha Build

This is an early Alpha build of my WIP pirate themed metroidvainia. Keep in mind things like artwork/animations/particles/etc may be still WIP and I am really looking to test and receive feedback on the core mechanics and a few of the Boss encounters.

there are three zones and three Bosses available.

Any feedback greatly appreciated.  Feel free to join my discord.

https://linktr.ee/kochaloch

Thanks!
